original_text: Therefore many of them believed; also of honourable women which were Greeks, and of men, not a few.
korean_text: 그 중에 믿는 사람이 많고 또 헬라의 귀부인과 남자가 적지 아니하나

sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그들 중 많은 사람이 믿었으며

sentences.original_text: also of honourable women which were Greeks
and of men, not a few
